channel.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP [delta]
channel.description: I need some serious help! how do i fix my combat with ancients? when players are using ancients in wilderness they only can cast spell's with the staff on why is that? how do i fix it??and when they are frozen and the person is in front of them they it says that they are frozen and cant attack the player please help me!?

item.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

do not multi post.

search for something like

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { //the ##would be the staffs ItemID.

And if you find anything then report back with the code.

Read full topic
